description: Describes a platform version. Provides full details. Compare to  ListPlatformVersions, which provides summary information about a list of platform versions. For definitions of platform version and other platform-related terms, see AWS Elastic Beanstalk Platforms Glossary.

nested_items.name: PlatformDescription
nested_items.description: Detailed information about the platform version.

nested_items.name: PlatformArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the platform version.

nested_items.name: PlatformOwner
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the person who created the platform version.

nested_items.name: PlatformName
nested_items.description: The name of the platform version.

nested_items.name: PlatformVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the platform version.

nested_items.name: SolutionStackName
nested_items.description: The name of the solution stack used by the platform version.

nested_items.name: PlatformStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the platform version.

nested_items.name: DateCreated
nested_items.description: The date when the platform version was created.

nested_items.name: DateUpdated
nested_items.description: The date when the platform version was last updated.

nested_items.name: PlatformCategory
nested_items.description: The category of the platform version.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the platform version.

nested_items.name: Maintainer
nested_items.description: Information about the maintainer of the platform version.

nested_items.name: OperatingSystemName
nested_items.description: The operating system used by the platform version.

nested_items.name: OperatingSystemVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the operating system used by the platform version.

nested_items.name: ProgrammingLanguages
nested_items.description: The programming languages supported by the platform version.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the programming language.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the programming language.

nested_items.name: Frameworks
nested_items.description: The frameworks supported by the platform version.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the framework.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the framework.

nested_items.name: CustomAmiList
nested_items.description: The custom AMIs supported by the platform version.

nested_items.name: VirtualizationType
nested_items.description: The type of virtualization used to create the custom AMI.

nested_items.name: ImageId
nested_items.description: THe ID of the image used to create the custom AMI.

nested_items.name: SupportedTierList
nested_items.description: The tiers supported by the platform version.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupportedAddonList
nested_items.description: The additions supported by the platform version.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: PlatformLifecycleState
nested_items.description: The state of the platform version in its lifecycle.

nested_items.name: PlatformBranchName
nested_items.description: The platform branch to which the platform version belongs.

nested_items.name: PlatformBranchLifecycleState
nested_items.description: The state of the platform version's branch in its lifecycle.
